author: David Harrison
title: Fed’s Brainard: Right Time to Modernize Community Reinvestment Act
text:
Federal Reserve governor Lael Brainard said Tuesday the central bank would work with other federal agencies to modernize the Community Reinvestment Act, a four-decade-old law designed to help low- and moderate-income neighborhoods get credit.
“The time is ripe to modernize the CRA regulations to make them more effective,” she said in remarks prepared for a speech in Baltimore.
